plot: A group of indigenous leaders travel from Paraguay to Bolivia to meet the Guarani and seek advice to solve the drought and confront their political situation.
title: Chaco rape
plot_es: A group of indigenous leaders travel from Paraguay to Bolivia to meet the Guarani and seek advice to solve the drought and confront their political situation.
